title: 1MillionBsc twitter account use for dev announcement (all blockchains) rather than focus in BSC blockchain
body:
Currently we use @1MillionBsc twitter account for all the announcements focused of $b1MT (BSC 1MT) however we have already the account @1MillionTokens also for this purpose. This proposal is for using @1MillionBsc to focus in dev announcements (dapps implementation, new pools, governance, etc...) for all blockchains (currently ETH, BSC) and @1MillionTokens focused in marketing (new partners, giveaways, etc...). Of course both accounts will continue retweeting each other.

**New strategy pro**
* Avoid duplication purposes
* Avoid to have one account per blockchain
* Having a communication channel for dev something missing currently
* Giving more protagonist to 1MT dev and encourage to the community to participate in it

**Current strategy pro**
* More social network decentralisation *if other members of the community take ownership of new accounts in case that we extend to other blockchains otherwise this point could be **overwhelming** and in this case it would be a **contra** instead of pro*
author: 0x619d3FA3bD7CF497d9899Ccd4d7b5663Ff318e52
